name: The Weird and Wonderful Reverie
description:
Premise

You wake up in a strange world with no idea how to get home. By exploring the world and interacting with the locals, you begin to your long journey home.

Controls 

Type commands into text box to interact with the world. Words that are put into [brackets] are actions you can perform or topics you can discuss with NPCs.

Esc - Quit game

Things To Do

Look - look at immediate surroundings, lists interactable objects and topics to explore.

Look at -  Look at specific objects, allows interaction in some cases

Jump on - Jump on specific objects to trigger quests

Poke - A fun command to poke poke-able things

Talk to...about... - Talk to NPCs about various topics

Back - Exit NPC conversations

Wish for - Wish upon a shooting star to grant your wish

Get - Pick up items and add them to your inventory

Drop - Get rid of items and place them back into the world

Use - Use specific items

Combine...and... - Combines two items together to create a third one

Drink - Drink things in your surroundings
